block.drill_drain.drill_drain.tooltip.su: Place _behind an array of drills_ to be able to _remove fluids_ as the drill moves, _requires space in the contraption_ to store the fluid (configurable)
drill_drain.ponder.drill_drain.text_1: Буровой дренаж может быть устоновлен за дрелью, The Drill Drain can be placed behind a drill, it will connect to a range of blocks in front of it
drill_drain.ponder.drill_drain.text_2: Attached fluid tanks will fill with the fluid captured by the drill,
drill_drain.ponder.drill_drain.text_3: В штуковине должно быть место для жидкости иначе, дренаж не будет всасовать жидкость.
